skills.name: Hyper RPM
skills.description: [SP: 18][CD: 24s] Revs up the spinning saw blades. Basic attacks (including charged attacks) gain 50.0% Attack Speed and 25.0% Crit Rate for 8s. Also increases Ignore Interrupt for the wielder in the duration.

skills.name: Lightning Punishment
skills.description: Crit Hits have a 25.0% of unleashing a lightning circle centered on the enemy, dealing 1,800 Lightning DMG and impairing it for 4s. Impaired enemies have reduced Ignore Interrupt and 50% less DEF. CD: 7s.
